Sophie. Will she, won't she. Please I hope she doesn't. #Baptiste deserves a happy ending and so does she... #Missing

So Henry Reed was the good guy. Deep down I kinda thought so... 😪 #TheMissing
Two spider tattoos. Already 🕷 #TheMissing
#TheMissing Qs: 1. Henry Reed 2. Charred body 3. DNA test 4. Whose baby 5. Stone's role 6. Eve's secret? 7. Nadia/butcher 8. That Iraqi guy.
@fascistCOW @SirDickOfHearts Yes if people take drugs they should earn the money to do so. They should also prioritise childcare first.
@fascistCOW You're spending time trolling people on Twitter. That's the very definition of a loser.
@fascistCOW Answer my question first.
@fascistCOW You're a parasite breathing precious air and writing absolute rubbish. Do you get off on being a loser hater?

@ericbristow Oh, and if I EVER hear you equate a paedophile to gay people EVER again, I'll teach you with my fists what a proper man is 😬👊🏽
@steven_walters4 You're really brave speaking out. Have much respect for you and hope this helps others while providing some closure. Big ❤️
@steven_walters4 Sorry you had to read his drivel. I was infuriated too. It was so crass, insensitive and demeaning. I went in on him.

@ericbristow This isn't about being "tough", it's about dealing with horrific abuse as a child and living with it.
@ericbristow What you said demeans victims. Sexual abuse is hugely traumatic & scars for life. Easy to say get them back, tough to do.
